sentence.Network_en: And then studied the origin and lithofacies meaning of siderite.
sentence.Network_cn: 在此基础上研究了菱铁矿的成因和岩相意义.

sentence.Network_en: IV. carbonate mineral contain iron , include siderite, ankerite, etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 含铁碳酸盐矿物:有菱铁矿及铁白云石等.

sentence.Network_en: Calcite, siderite, barite and others don't contain gold.
sentence.Network_cn: 方解石 、 菱铁矿 、 重晶石等不含金.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 菱铁矿(Siderite)是含有碳酸铁的矿石,主要成份为FeCO3,呈现青灰色,比重在3.8左右。这种矿石多半含有相当多数量的钙盐和镁盐。由于碳酸根在高温约800～900℃时会.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting lodestone): from Greek sidēros 'iron' + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. iron ore in the form of ferrous carbonate
2. a meteorite consisting principally of nickel and iron
